::Fenox::

Fenox catches Vlad's evil smile, noting it to herself. She looks back 
at it, smiling sweetly at his compliment of her. As she took his arm, 
she briefly wondered whether the smile was for getting possible 
access to the comps or for getting the info he wanted.

"Its right this way," she says, pointing toward a corner where she 
knew a console was located, and waiting for Vlad to start walking.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Carnage Blood" <Carnage@d...> wrote:
> ** Vlad did not look down at Shesta as she received a rather 
friendly stroke behind the ear by Fenox, hearing her words rather 
then paying attention to the world about him. His optics narrowing 
slightly as she smiled before mentioning that their computer activity 
systems continued what information he could use to able him to locate 
Von.
> Vlad smiled wickedly to himself, flashing a rather deadly set of 
teeth. However, he quickly righted himself in appearance and all evil 
aspects vanished from his features, leaving the smile of a charmingly 
handsome young man. Vlad leaned back, paying no such a mind to the 
wolf which seemed to wish to be picking his teeth with his super 
structure.** " Sounds like perfection to my needs, My Lady." ** Vlad 
went into a slight bow.** " As I am sure you are to the many eyes of 
preying men." ** He gave her a look which went along with his charm, 
but was in truth fake interest.
> Vlad had a long history of using people to get what he wanted, no 
matter the cost. And a broken spark was easily patched when the other 
person found what could mend it.
> He offered Fenox his arm so that she could lead him to a console 
where he could collect data on Von.**
> 
>
